articles.title: Next-Generation iMac Chip, Stand, and Color Details Rumored Ahead of Apple Event - MacRumors
articles.description: Apple's upcoming iMac refresh will feature a new chip, an internally redesigned stand, and a similar array of color options to the current model,...
articles.content:
Apple's upcoming iMac refresh will feature a new chip, an internally redesigned stand, and a similar array of color options to the current model, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.
